thread.title: Palatin Technologies raises $30mm via warrants and debt sale
thread.title_full: Palatin Technologies raises $30mm via warrants and debt sale

title: Palatin Technologies raises $30mm via warrants and debt sale
text:
Palatin Technologies raises $30mm via warrants and debt sale Deal Date: Jul-01-2015 / Deal # 201530551 Executive Summary 
Palatin Technologies Inc. raised $30mm through the sale of both warrants and debt. The company closed a private placement of Series E warrants for 21.9mm common shares and Series F warrants for 2.2mm common shares. Funds managed by QVT Financial LP invested $5mm along with $15mm invested from another investment fund. The funds paid $0.90 per Series E warrant and $0.125 per Series F warrant.
